alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 11 at 9:00PM CDT until August 12 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, Southern Lake, Southern Cook and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. In Wisconsin, Douglas, Bayfield, Ashland and Iron Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band, the Red Cliff Band, the northwestern area of the Lac du Flambeau Band, the Grand Portage Reservation, the Bad River Reservation and the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
